# Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Project Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of a Senior Financial Specialist to meet key deliverables and timelines in support of the Chief Financial Officer. The requirement is for a senior-level financial specialist to address ongoing operations of Financial Management and Treasury Board (TB) Submission Unit.

### Key Details
- **Request for Services**: Senior Financial Specialist
- **Duration**: July 2, 2024 to June 30, 2025
- **Estimated Level of Effort**: 240 days
- **Security Clearance**: Modified RCMP SRCL103678 and Security Guide apply

### Eligibility Criteria
The requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under "Tier 1" ($0 - $3.75M) and under the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise for the financial specialist category (3.8).

### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this RFP are:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Procurement Method
This RFP is subject to the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply.

### Instructions for Bids
Bidders are advised to submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions provided in the RFP document. The deadline for submission is June 19, 2024 at 2:00 pm (ET).

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Stacy Seme at stacy.seme@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (343) 574-7219.

### Additional Information
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Please refer to the RFP document for additional information.
